plugins.name: dere-core
plugins.description: Core dere infrastructure: personality tone, emotion awareness (OCC), memory/recall, knowledge graph integration, and environmental context. Always enabled.

plugins.name: dere-vault
plugins.description: Zettelkasten knowledge vault skills for working with Obsidian-style markdown vaults following atomic note principles

plugins.name: dere-productivity
plugins.description: Comprehensive productivity suite: GTD task management (Taskwarrior), calendar integration (Google Calendar), activity tracking (ActivityWatch), and intelligent scheduling. Opt-in productivity features.

plugins.name: dere-graph-features
plugins.description: Output styles and utilities for dere knowledge graph extraction

plugins.name: dere-code
plugins.description: Coding workflow automation - symbol-aware navigation, memory persistence, and safe refactoring patterns
